name: Gato Project Demo
description:
(GAME IN PROGRESS)

Here you have a Tamagotchi Cicker! Combine the simple mechanics of a clicker while taking care of your virtual pet.

Play with your cat to unlock new rooms and objects that you will be able to use to decorate the house and get upgrades for the clicker or the stats.

For this demo only the kitchen room is available and the economy is provisional.

The completed version will mainly have: 

  • Rooms: kitchen, bedroom, dining room, toilet and garden.
  • Clothes for the pet (will grant power-ups).
  • More variety of food.
  • Save system.
  • Localization: english, spanish
